member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker
member.summary: An abstract class has the common shared implementations for the "" interface.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.ErrorRaisedHandler
member.summary: A delegate to handel the error raised by the class.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.CacheParsedCommandHandler
member.summary:
Caches parsed command generated from the passed JSON data.
This method will be triggered only if the "CommandCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The parsed command generated from the passed JSON data.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.GetCachedParsedCommandHandler
member.summary:
Gets the cached parsed command generated from the passed JSON data. This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
This method will be triggered only if the "CommandCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
member.returns: The cached parsed command generated from the passed JSON data.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.CacheExecutionValueHandler
member.summary:
Caches the execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.
This method will be triggered only if the "ValueCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
The "ValueCached" property should only marked as true if we are pretty sure that this rule can be called over and over by the same inputs.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The inputs values to be combined with the rule key in the cache to distinguish the cached values by different inputs for the same rule.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.GetCachedExecutionValueHandler
member.summary:
Gets the cached execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.
This method will be triggered only if the "ValueCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
The "ValueCached" property should only marked as true if we are pretty sure that this rule can be called over and over by the same inputs.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The inputs values to be combined with the rule key in the cache to distinguish the cached values by different inputs for the same rule.
member.returns: The cached execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.GetConditionTableFromSourceHandler
member.summary: Called when [get the Condition Table from either some data source or cache].
member.returns: The Condition Table from either some data source or cache.

member.summary: Executes the rule and return the output values as "" where "T" is "" (where "TKey" is a "" and "TValue" is an "").
member.param: The name of the rule to be executed.
The inputs data as "" where "TKey" is a "" and "TValue" is an "". Those inputs names must be covered inside the specified rule in the "Inputs" section.
member.returns: The validated results as "" where "TKey" is a "" and "TValue" is an "".

member.summary:
Gets the cached parsed command generated from the passed JSON data. This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
This method will be triggered only if the "CommandCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.

member.name: M:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.OnCacheExecutionValue(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.Object}},System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Caches the execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.
This method will be triggered only if the "ValueCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
The "ValueCached" property should only marked as true if we are pretty sure that this rule can be called over and over by the same inputs.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The inputs values to be combined with the rule key in the cache to distinguish the cached values by different inputs for the same rule.
if set to true [flush all the cached execution values for this rule].

member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The inputs values to be combined with the rule key in the cache to distinguish the cached values by different inputs for the same rule.
member.returns: The cached execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.

member.name: M:DevHorizons.Horus.Abstract.Invoker.DevHorizons#Horus#Interfaces#IInvoker#ExecuteCommand(System.String)
member.summary:
Executes the generated/parsed command/code from the specified rule.
This method can be overridden by a derived class to change the behaviour/implementation of the method using the generated command/code by a new technique or different scripting library.
member.returns: The validated results as "" where "TKey" is a "" and "TValue" is an "".

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Interfaces.IInvoker
member.summary: Defines all the required members for the invoker classes.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Interfaces.IInvoker.ErrorRaisedHandler
member.summary: The error raised delegate to handle all the raised errors and or for logging them if required.
member.param: The error raised as an instance of "".

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Interfaces.IInvoker.CacheParsedCommandHandler
member.summary:
Caches parsed command generated from the passed JSON data.
This method will be triggered only if the "CommandCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The parsed command generated from the passed JSON data.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Interfaces.IInvoker.GetCachedParsedCommandHandler
member.summary:
Gets the cached parsed command generated from the passed JSON data. This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
This method will be triggered only if the "CommandCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
member.returns: The cached parsed command generated from the passed JSON data.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Interfaces.IInvoker.CacheExecutionValueHandler
member.summary:
Caches the execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.
This method will be triggered only if the "ValueCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
The "ValueCached" property should only marked as true if we are pretty sure that this rule can be called over and over by the same inputs.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The inputs values to be combined with the rule key in the cache to distinguish the cached values by different inputs for the same rule.
if set to true [flush all the cached execution values for this rule].

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Interfaces.IInvoker.GetCachedExecutionValueHandler
member.summary:
Gets the cached execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.
This method will be triggered only if the "ValueCached" property is marked as true inside the rule's JSON data.
The "ValueCached" property should only marked as true if we are pretty sure that this rule can be called over and over by the same inputs.
This method needs to be implemented by the caller/consumer application.
member.param: The unique key of the specified rule.
The inputs values to be combined with the rule key in the cache to distinguish the cached values by different inputs for the same rule.
member.returns: The cached execution value/result after executing a successful command generated from the specified rule.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.CachedConditionTables
member.summary: The container of the cached condition tables in the memory.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.CachedConditionTables.ConditionTables
member.summary: Gets the list of the rules structures.

member.name: T:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable
member.summary:
The Condition Table definition which will be extracted from the rule set JSON data.
The condition table is an extension of the decision table with advanced/complex rules/conditions.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the Decision Table name.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.Group
member.summary: Gets or sets the group name.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.ResetCache
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether [reset the cache for this rule only once], the next time attempting to call this rules.
This will be managed by the "DevHorizons.Horus.WebApi" project and no user should explicitly alter it.
member.value: If set to true the entire cache will be flushed for this rule with the next execution only and then it will be automatically set to false again.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.DataCached
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the whole rule design/body can be cached.
By default the rule will be cached unless it is explicitly set to false.
member.value: null or true, cache the whole rule; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.CommandCached
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the generated/parsed command can be cached.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.ValueCached
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the return values of the rule can be cached as unique cache for each different/unique inputs.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.TwoDimResults
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the rule's executiona output/result will be [two dimensional results] as a collection of "" instead of a single one.
member.value: If set to true, the output/result of the rule's exection will be a collection of "", otherwise, the out put will be a single "".

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the rule's description.

member.summary: Gets or sets the inputs.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.Outputs
member.summary: Gets or sets the outputs.

member.name: P:DevHorizons.Horus.Model.ConditionTable.Decisions
member.summary: Gets or sets the decisions.

member.summary: Gets or sets the return values in case of the condition is validated.
member.value: The return values in case of the condition is validated.
